snippet: As the Global Clean Energy Forum gets underway in Barcelona, the International Herald Tribune has published a series of articles on the subject. Rendezvous will be showing live and recorded video from the conference.
abstract: As the Global Clean Energy Forum gets underway in Barcelona, the International Herald Tribune has published a series of articles on the subject. Rendezvous will be showing live and recorded video from the conference.

headline.main: Underway in Barcelona: the Global Clean Energy Forum
